.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TransposeLoader extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataLoader, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataView, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ISchematized, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ITransposeDataView, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Model.ICanSaveModel
Public NotInheritable Class TransposeLoader Implements IDataLoader, IDataView, ITransposeDataView
type TransposeLoader = class interface IDataLoader interface IDataView interface ISchematized interface ICanSaveModel interface ITransposeDataView

Docs.summary: The transposed loader reads the transposed binary format. This binary format, at a high level, is nothing more than, for a dataview with "c" columns, "c+1" binary IDVs glued together. We call these sub-IDVs. The first of these, the master sub-IDV stores the overall schema, and optionally the data in row-wise format.
